name: Washington

authority.name: DC DMV Adjudication Services
authority.authority_name: District of Columbia Department of Motor Vehicles
authority.serves_description: Parking citations issued by District parking enforcement within Washington, DC.

citation_pattern.notes: Citation numbers are numeric and printed on official DC DMV parking tickets.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals (requests for adjudication) can be submitted online, by mail, or in person at the Adjudication Service Center.

phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm the mailing address and procedures for contesting DC parking citations.

verification.source_note: Mail adjudication address verified from DC DMV contest page【86828217279799†L210-L214】.

official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing for Washington, DC citations.
qa_blocking_issues: Metro Transit Police (WMATA) appeal procedures require confirmation; limited information is available on mailing address and online options.
American University, Howard University, Gallaudet University, and GWU sections lack verified mailing addresses for Phase-1 appeals.
qa_known_gaps: Citation number patterns for all authorities are approximations with low confidence.
Some campus and special district authorities require further phone confirmation to verify appeal routing and mailing addresses.
